original_title: Pioneers: First Women Filmmakers: An Introduction
overview: Among the informative talking heads spread throughout all of these featurettes are Rob Stone, George Willeman and Lynane Schweighofer of the Library of Congress, along with Anthony Slide, Jane M. Gaines, Shelley Stamp, Karen Ward Maher, and Alison McMahan.
title: Pioneers: First Women Filmmakers: An Introduction
